entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Truro
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 59 %

Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening then north 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
